name: Holiday Inn Express Lake Buena Vista

reviews.text: We booked this hotel due to it's location, price, and the reviews. Overall, this hotel wasn't a disappointment but we weren't very impressed either. The lobby, room and bathroom were very clean. The bed was comfortable-I especially loved the soft sheets and comforter & that the bedspread was a blue thin blanket that could be easily washed. I was concerned about dust mites as I am allergic to them and unfortunately there must have been a population in the heavy curtains or carpet because my nose closed up fast & my throat hurt. Besides that, the only other negative regarding the room was that our phone did not ring/was broken & we never got our wake up call. The pool was small but nice with a waterslide. There's also a wooden playhouse with sand for the kids nearby. Big plus: the hotel is located close to many restaurants and a hop, skip and jump away from Disney. Big negative: the heavily advertised hot breakfast wasn't so hot. We thought we'd get bacon or sausage. But besides the scrambled eggs, the only hot protein was very little pieces of sausage in a white country gravy. The rest of the buffet was pretty good though--pasties, breads, cereals, milk, yogurt, fruits, biscuits, oj, apple juice and coffee. And they kept it neat and stocked despite the crowded breakfast room. However, I'd stayed at a similar hotel (that advertised a hot breakfast) last year, and their buffet delivered with great hot food. This buffet did not. Overall, it was a nicely priced hotel with some good amenities, but we won' t be staying there nor recommending it to friends.
reviews.title: Clean Hotel, hot breakfast was just okay

reviews.text: My family and I just came back from spending 2 nights at this hotel. We decided to stay at this hotel due to all the good reviews we read on this website. We were not dissapointed and the hotel was just what we needed.
reviews.title: Clean, Clean, Clean...

likes.disliked: — The bathroom could use a fan, but it's not a big deal.

reviews.text: To start out with, the hotel was clean, clean, clean...including the bedrooms and the premises. With a 15 month old daughter I am definately picky about where we stay and I can say I will stay in this hotel again when we return to Oralndo. Our bedroom and bathroom were spotless every day and we felt very comfortable. The pillows were awesome and I wanted to bring one home with me.
reviews.title: Eaxctly as promised--very satisfactory!

reviews.text: The complimentary breakfast was great and it saved us some money both days we were there. The location of the hotel is also amazing, with Disney World and any restaurant you can think of close by.
reviews.title: Good stay

reviews.text: The hotel staff was very friendly, making our check in and out VERY easy.
reviews.title: great hotel experience

reviews.text: We made the reservations on priceline which I guess was the first mistake. When we checked in we were given a room that was already occupied. They gave us a new room and there was only one bed. The reservations were for 4 people. We had to pay an additional $10 per day for a room with another bed. When I talked to the desk clerk she said that a manager would contact me. They never did. We requested the room be cleaned during our stay and it never was. When we checked out I was told that we would have the $10 per day fee refunded. It never was and when I called when we got home about it my messages were never returned. I have stayed a Holiday Inn Express before at different locations and have found the service to be wonderful. This one was not the case however. It was the worst service I have ever had. I will never stay at this hotel again and have told everyone I know about what happened. We have young children and I am sure we will be visiting the area many times in the future.
reviews.title: Will never stay there again

reviews.text: Just got back and wanted to add that this place is under rated. It is very close to all fun parks, near I -4 and International drive. It has been remodeled and I had a great stay. Bathroom even had marble counter tops. Very clean and staff was friendly. Pool has a waterfall and slide. It could use some decorations to spruce up the pool area but kids won't care. It is connected to a strip mall that has a Hooters , another sports bar, a real Cuban restaurant, a CiCis Pizza, a Japanese Steakhouse, and a Seafood rest. Not bad for walking distance.
reviews.title: Great place for good price

reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel for a short trip to Disney. It's located across the street from the Disney main gate, so it was no problem getting to the parks. Breakfast was fine; better than I have seen at a lot of hotels that advertise breakfast. The beds were comfortable, the room seemed a little larger than average and we had no problem with anything. The pool was small, but has a cool waterfall/slide thing so at least it was more interesting than a plain hotel pool. Reasonably priced, near a variety of restaurants and a grocery store...we would definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: Nice, convenient hotel
Clean but a little worn
reviews.text: Just back from two nights at HIX at Disney. Hotel was clean (as advertised), but rooms were a little worn. Rooms are spacious, with microwave and mini fridge. Old style tv's. Would a flat screen kill ya? Painter must' have been drunk. Plastic chairs on balcony looked like they'd been picked from the dump. Breakfast was good - nice variety of foods and the staff kept it clean and stocked. Really close to the parks, with a variety of restaurants and a supermarket and liquor store right nearby. Pool and hottub were fine. Only real complaint is that when we made the booking we asked for adjoining rooms but they couldn't accommodate. For the price, it's a pretty good deal.

We travel to the Orlando area once or twice a year and have stayed in various hotels on and off Disney property. (See my other reviews.) I can honestly say that this is the best value I have ever encountered in this area.:
reviews.title: Excellent value!

reviews.text: This is a late entry, but I feel you need to know. We were scheduled to stay here 3 nights, but we ended up leaving in the middle of the night.. The room was old and mold was in the bathroom. The matteress is old. After returning from dinner we heard someone compliaining about bed, bug bites. The customers showed the hotel staff, bites on their legs and arms. After hearing that, we went up stairs, grabbed our bags and got out of the hotel.
reviews.title: think twice

reviews.text: This is an average to nice hotel. There is no wow factor and pretty basic. It is however clean. This is very important to me so it really stood out. It is in a nice area with lots of restaurants and shops all around. It is also located near a vacant building and this was our view from the balcony which wasn't too nice. It also has alot of traffic in the area, which can move very slowly at times. It is very close to Disney. It does have shuttles to Disney , but is very limited on pick up and drop off times.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel

likes.disliked: — View of vacant building and ugly lot next door.

reviews.text: We did not use the pool, but it looked nice. We ate the free breakfast one morning, but preferred IHOP down the road.
reviews.title: Not Very Appealing

reviews.text: The staff was very nice and helpful.
reviews.title: Nice, convenient hotel close to Disney World.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall, we were happy with our stay. It provided us with what we needed: a safe clean place to rest our heads at the end of the day.
reviews.title: Disney on your doorstep

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Another nice stay at the Holiday Inn Express! Spacious rooms, clean, quiet hotel in a safe area that can't be beat for this low price. Get used to a complete breakfast with hot foods, which you will not find at most places. The pool is nice, the hottub is hot, yes everything was in order as usual. Comfy beds and a quiet room will put you to sleep quickly after a long day at the theme parks. You will come back to a room that is always clean, beds made and bathroom stocked. Nice job here from all the staff. I say thumbs up!!
reviews.title: Another nice stay

likes.liked: — clean and comfortable large rooms at a great price
likes.disliked: — that slow elevator will always annoy me

reviews.text: Stayed here for 9 nights. Hotel was easy to find from web-site directions. Check in and check out was efficient. Room was large (particularly for this category of hotel). Huge comfy king size bed. There was no safe in the room but there are safety deposit boxes at the reception. Shower was warm and bathroom basic but functional. Fittings were not luxurious (and it is banded as a 2 star hotel) but were perfectly functional. The pool area was well maintained and fairly quiet for most of the trip. Great to be able to pick up a paper at the reception each day. There is a time share info centre but once you have said "no" I did not feel hassled by them at all. All the staff were professional and friendly. Plenty of parking spaces. We were at the front of the hotel (on the 6th floor) and could hear the karaoke from the nearby bar until gone 2am in the morning on one night! Overall a great hotel and fantastic value for money!
reviews.title: Great value for money!

reviews.text: I stayed at this HI for 2 nights in mid-May 2008.
reviews.title: It did the job, nice hotel, easy to find

reviews.text: The employees were friendly, the check-in was swift, the lobby & decor is nice. It wasn't hard to find, very accessible. I was greeted as Priority Club, but unlike a previous review, I didn't receive any sort of welcome basket? I have never before.
reviews.title: Excellent value, great stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was large but the bathroom definitely needs more lights and our bathroom door did not fit the hinges, which was really odd. I reported it on our way out and the front next looked shocked, so I assume they did not know about it.
reviews.title: LOVED THIS HOTEL!!!!

likes.disliked: — The light was congested. Had to constantly u-turn for access to restaurants.

aka: Holiday Inn Express Lake Buena Vista Hotel Orlando
description: Welcome to the Holiday Inn Express Lake Buena Vista Orlando, Florida, a 100% non-smoking hotel, this first-class Walt Disney World Good Neighbor Hotel is the closest Holiday Inn Express to the Walt Disney World Resort area. Located one mile to Walt Disney World Resort area with free scheduled shuttle to Epcot . From Epcot , transportation is available to Magic Kingdom Park, Disney s Animal Kingdom Theme Park and Disney's Hollywood Studios. Downtown Disney. area is minutes away offering shopping and restaurants including House of Blues and Pleasure Island featuring nightlife and entertainment. Sea World, Universal Studios and City Walk are within 10 miles of the hotel. This Orlando hotel is in the heart of Central Florida attractions and shopping areas. Premium Outlet Shopping Center and Mall of Millennia are close by along with other outlet shopping areas. This hotel is ideal for children, adults and corporate guests. Stay Smart and start your day with our complimentary breakfast. The entire family will enjoy the outdoor heated pool. Inspired from nature, a waterfall cascades over giant rock formations into a sparkling pool. Bursting through the waterfall is a 50 foot water slide!We offer free high-speed Internet and free local calls. Two meeting rooms are ready to host your Orlando meetings. Orlando Orange County Convention Center is 6 miles. Designated Florida Green Lodging Hotel.
